Desc.entry: A developing local cricket club which has two senior teams which compete in the South Yorkshire Cricket League in the premier and second divisions. Also runs four junior teams and a regular Thursday night coaching session for all local children. Also involved in the annual Kwik Cricket tournament between numerous Sheffield junior schools and is dedicated to the development of junior cricket in the area. Has a thriving social section and organises several social functions throughout the season. The club has a new pavilion and social club.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Denise Fletcher, Secretary/Mr Stephen Fletcher

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Most evenings during the cricket season (Apr-Sep) and every Saturday from 1pm
